        category="Spark",

      • notifyJobOutputConnections

        public void notifyJobOutputConnections()
                                throws weka.core.WekaException
        Description copied from class: AbstractSparkJob
        Notifies listeners of output from this job. Subclasses need to override this if they have specific output connections for various data types

        weka.core.WekaException - if a problem occurs
